sources.title: The Great Bird Mystery (1932)
sources.description: Scrappy and Oopie build a bird house, and a sparrow wants to move in. However a mean robin stops him, and then tries to kill him with an arrow. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-great-bird-mystery-1932/

metadata.Plot: Scrappy and Oopie build a bird house, and a sparrow wants to move in. However a mean robin stops him, and then tries to kill him with an arrow.It's a particularly fine Scrappy cartoon from the silly mind of Dick Huemer . All too often, his Scrappies are split in two, and the second half has a tacked-on feel to it, as if he thought "We really need a plot, so here it is." At that point, they often lose their silly, inventive sense. Not this one. This maintains its five-year-old sensibilities all the way through to the end.
